translation.en: -[player 1] Keep the pack together! -[players yelling]
translation.ja: 上流階級によって 牛耳られていた

translation.en: [player 3] Well played, Arthur.
translation.ja: よくやった

translation.en: -[boy 1] Here he comes! -[boy 2] Are you sure it's him?
translation.ja: 着いた！ 彼か？

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. Kinnaird, will the Old Etonians
translation.ja: ロンドン メイフェア ロンドン メイフェア 今年の優勝はどうです？

translation.en: take the FA Cup this year?
translation.ja: 今年の優勝はどうです？

translation.en: [boy 1] Can we have an autograph?
translation.ja: サインを下さい

translation.en: What of your quarter-final opponents, Darwen FC?
translation.ja: 準々決勝の相手は ダーウェンですが

translation.en: What do you think? Can they stop me winning another Cup?
translation.ja: 僕が負けると思うか？

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no! Not at all, sir! -[boy 1] Never!
translation.ja: いいえ　負けるわけない

translation.en: You can quote them on that.
translation.ja: 引用してくれ

translation.en: Ah, it's a wonder your head still fits through the door.
translation.ja: 少し自信過剰すぎるわよ

translation.en: [man] Fergus Suter, you and I are gonna make history.
translation.ja: ファーガス･スーター 新たな歴史を作ろう

translation.en: [station attendant] Darwen. This is Darwen.
translation.ja: ランカシャー ダーウェン

translation.en: -[train whistle blows] -Come on. Let's go.
translation.ja: さあ　行くぞ

translation.en: [man] I've seen how you play in Scotland. Your passing game is the future of football.
translation.ja: お前らスコットランド人が サッカーの未来を変える

translation.en: [man] Let's talk in my office.
translation.ja: 事務所で話そう

translation.en: So...
translation.ja: それで―

translation.en: -How you both feeling? -Ready to get started.
translation.ja: 気分は？ やる気満々だ

translation.en: So long as you keep your end of the bargain.
translation.ja: 約束を守ってください

translation.en: Food and board's all arranged, as agreed.
translation.ja: 生活費は与える

translation.en: They're not gonna know what's hit 'em.
translation.ja: 選手たちが驚くぞ

translation.en: Who are the new lads, then?
translation.ja: あの新人たちは？

translation.en: [man 1] Not from round here, that's for sure.
translation.ja: さあな　きっとよそ者だろう

translation.en: They're not mill workers either.
translation.ja: 工場労働者でもない

translation.en: [man 2] Why has Walsh gone and brought them here?
translation.ja: なら 何しに来た？

translation.en: [man 3] Got our new jerseys, lads.
translation.ja: 新しい運動着だ

translation.en: Finished 'em up last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜 完成した

translation.en: [man 3] And youse, captain. -There you go. -[man 4] Ready for the big game Saturday?
translation.ja: 主将 土曜日の試合が楽しみだ

translation.en: And one for each of the new lads.
translation.ja: 新人にも配れ

translation.en: That's all there was, Mr. Walsh. I've only done 11.
translation.ja: もうありませんよ ウォルシュさん

translation.en: Jones, Harris, you don't mind, do you?
translation.ja: ジョーンズとハリスは抜けろ

translation.en: I'd like to give Mr. Suter and Mr. Love a chance.
translation.ja: 代わりに スーターとラヴが

translation.en: Fergus Suter... and Jimmy Love?
translation.ja: スーターとラヴって―

translation.en: Not the Fergus Suter and Jimmy Love who play for Partick?
translation.ja: パーティックの選手ですか？

translation.en: They don't play for Partick anymore. They're Darwen players now.
translation.ja: ダーウェンの選手になった

translation.en: Mr. Walsh, with respect, sir, Jones and Harris helped us get to the quarter-finals.
translation.ja: ジョーンズたちのおかげで 準々決勝まで進めました

translation.en: And these two are going to help us win the damn thing. Now, this is my mill. My team.
translation.ja: 新人たちのおかげで 決勝戦でも勝てるぞ

translation.en: [Walsh] Now, give 'em the jerseys.
translation.ja: 早く渡せ

translation.en: [Walsh] Good lads.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I've put you in here.
translation.ja: ここよ

translation.en: This is nice.
translation.ja: いい部屋だ

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Walsh was most particular. Which of you is Mr. Suter?
translation.ja: ところで どちらがスーターさん？

translation.en: That's me.
translation.ja: 俺だ

translation.en: That means you must be Mr. Love.
translation.ja: あなたはラヴさんね

translation.en: Guilty as charged.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Does Mr. Platt work for Mr. Walsh?
translation.ja: 夫のプラットさんは？

translation.en: Uh, he used to. I'm a widow.
translation.ja: もう亡くなったわ

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.ja: それは気の毒に

translation.en: -Jimmy, for the love of God, no. -What?
translation.ja: ジミー　口説くなよ

translation.en: [Fergus] Keep your mind on the game.
translation.ja: 試合に集中しろ

translation.en: Did you know there were 43 teams in the Cup this year?
translation.ja: 今年は43チームが出場して―

translation.en: And Arthur's is one of the last eight left in.
translation.ja: アーサーたちがベスト８に

translation.en: Isn't that splendid?
translation.ja: すごいわ

translation.en: We're playing a mill team in the quarter-finals this Saturday, Papa.
translation.ja: 父上　対戦相手は 織物工場のチームです

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 労働者が―

translation.en: The quarter-finals?
translation.ja: 準々決勝に？

translation.en: Do the millhands often get that far?
translation.ja: 珍しいことでは？

translation.en: [Arthur] No, not usually.
translation.ja: ええ　確かに

translation.en: [Lord Kinnaird] Will you go on with this once your child arrives?
translation.ja: 子供が生まれても 続ける気か？

translation.en: I hadn't given it much thought.
translation.ja: 深く考えてません

translation.en: Did you play much sport, Papa?
translation.ja: お義父(とう)様もスポーツを？

translation.en: I shot, of course. I never hunted.
translation.ja: 猟犬を使った狩猟(スポーツ)は経験ない

translation.en: -I'm not against it-- -But you are against football?
translation.ja: 抵抗はないが… サッカーには？

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: もちろんない

translation.en: I think it a healthy way for little boys to get fit.
translation.ja: でも 子供向けの運動だぞ

translation.en: [station attendant] All aboard!
translation.ja: 乗客の皆さん

translation.en: All passengers!
translation.ja: お急ぎください

translation.en: Train's about to depart!
translation.ja: ＦＡカップ 準々決勝の日 ＦＡカップ 準々決勝の日 出発しますよ

translation.en: All aboard, please!
translation.ja: お急ぎください

translation.en: [Walsh] Only gentlemen have lifted the Cup.
translation.ja: これまで優勝したのは

translation.en: Men from fine schools, with fine clothes, fine lives.
translation.ja: いい学校を卒業した 上流階級のチームだけだ

translation.en: Imagine what it would mean to see men like us lift it.
translation.ja: もし この俺たちが 優勝したら？

translation.en: That's the dream.
translation.ja: 最高です

translation.en: [Walsh] Well, I want to wake up and find it's more than a dream.
translation.ja: 俺は その夢をかなえたい

translation.en: To find out it's happened.
translation.ja: だから お前らを―

translation.en: See, that's the reason I brought you to Darwen, Fergus.
translation.ja: ダーウェンに連れてきた

translation.en: [Walsh] Wait here, lads. [Darwen player] Stop, lads. Hold up.
translation.ja: お前たち　ここで待ってろ

translation.en: What do you make of this, lads?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: You'd think the Queen lived here.
translation.ja: 宮殿みたいだ

translation.en: Boys.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: -[Darwen player] Look at these lads! -Gentlemen.
translation.ja: 皆さん

translation.en: [Arthur] Welcome.
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: I'm, uh... I'm captain of the Old Etonians.
translation.ja: イートニアンズの主将だ

translation.en: -You're Arthur Kinnaird? -That's right.
translation.ja: アーサー？ ああ

translation.en: I saw you play at Hampden a few years back against Queen's Park.
translation.ja: 数年前に試合で あんたを見たよ

translation.en: [stammers] You were good.
translation.ja: 見事だった

translation.en: Well, that's high praise indeed.
translation.ja: それは光栄だ

translation.en: Of course, the game's changed since your heyday.
translation.ja: サッカーのスタイルは 変わりつつある

translation.en: I mean, it has in Scotland, at least.
translation.ja: サッカーのスタイルは 変わりつつある 時代の流れに乗るのは 大変だろう

translation.en: Must be hard moving with the times.
translation.ja: 時代の流れに乗るのは 大変だろう

translation.en: Well, now we've established that my best days are in the past, perhaps we should get moving.
translation.ja: 僕の全盛期が終わったと 言いたいのか？

translation.en: -I never meant-- -What's your name?
translation.ja: 違う 名前は？

translation.en: Fergus Suter.
translation.ja: ファーガス

translation.en: The Suter who plays for Hibernian?
translation.ja: ハイバーニアンの選手か？

translation.en: Partick.
translation.ja: パーティックだ

translation.en: Well, I used to, at any rate. Now I play for Darwen.
translation.ja: 今はダーウェンの選手だがな

translation.en: It's hardly a... hardly a local team for you.
translation.ja: そんなに遠くから来たとは

translation.en: Jimmy and I wanted a change of scene.
translation.ja: ジミーと気分転換で来た

translation.en: -Jimmy? -Jimmy Love.
translation.ja: ジミー？ ジミー･ラヴ

translation.en: -He made the trip down, too. -Did he indeed?
translation.ja: こいつと来た そうか

translation.en: Uh, everyone, these boys will show you to your changing rooms.
translation.ja: この子たちが 更衣室に案内する

translation.en: [Darwen player] Hurry up, lads. Suit up and boot up.
translation.ja: さっさと靴を履け

translation.en: I've been through our Football Association records,
translation.ja: あの２人が ダーウェンの選手として―

translation.en: and neither Fergus Suter nor Jimmy Love played for them in the previous rounds.
translation.ja: あの２人が ダーウェンの選手として― プレーした記録は 残ってなかった

translation.en: There's nothing in the rules that say they can't switch team members.
translation.ja: 選手の変更は問題ない

translation.en: True, but why would two successful Scottish players
translation.ja: でも なぜ優秀な選手が―

translation.en: leave Glasgow to join a tinpot mill team in Darwen?
translation.ja: わざわざ 織物工場のチームに？

translation.en: Clearly, they're being paid.
translation.ja: きっと報酬を得てる

translation.en: To play football? But that's against the rules.
translation.ja: 金をもらってプレー？ 規則違反だ

translation.en: Surely, no one would risk suspension from the Cup?
translation.ja: バレたら追放だぞ あり得ない

translation.en: It would explain why two players would travel from Scotland to join a team they have no connection with.
translation.ja: でも あの２人は 縁のないチームに入った

translation.en: -Now, how do we prove it? -[Arthur] We don't need to.
translation.ja: 他に理由が？ 理由なんて どうでもいい

translation.en: We'll beat them today,
translation.ja: 理由なんて どうでもいい

translation.en: and they'll be knocked out the competition.
translation.ja: 奴らを敗退させよう

translation.en: -Are we right, lads? -[players] Aye.
translation.ja: 準備はいいか はい

translation.en: [Walsh] Now, remember, they're a rough team.
translation.ja: 相手は かなり乱暴だ

translation.en: They'll play as a pack and try to run through you.
translation.ja: 群れになって攻撃を仕掛ける

translation.en: -[player 1] Let's go then, boys. -[player 2] Come on. Stick together.
translation.ja: 気合入れて行こうぜ

translation.en: When we get out, I lead from the front.
translation.ja: 俺が先頭に立つ

translation.en: -Come on. -[Jimmy] Fergie! You coming?
translation.ja: ファーガス　早く来いよ

translation.en: [woman] What's all this to-do about?
translation.ja: 何の騒ぎ？

translation.en: Playing in the quarter-finals of the FA Cup.
translation.ja: サッカーの準々決勝さ

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: Just waiting on news from the match.
translation.ja: 速報を待ってる

translation.en: Well, I've made it, Mr. Suter, even if my glory days are behind me.
translation.ja: 全盛期が終わったとしても 僕は試合に出るぞ

translation.en: Right. Let's knock these posh bastards off the perch.
translation.ja: エリート野郎どもを見返そう

translation.en: Is that it?
translation.ja: 今のが指示か

translation.en: I suppose he's the captain, Fergus.
translation.ja: 彼が主将だから仕方ない

translation.en: Stay tight.
translation.ja: 離れるな

translation.en: [Fergus] Play the ball.
translation.ja: 蹴れ

translation.en: -[Arthur] Take him! -[Fergus grunts]
translation.ja: 倒せ！

translation.en: Game doesn't seem to have changed so very much, Mr. Suter.
translation.ja: スタイルは さほど変わってない

translation.en: [man] The Old Etonians have scored again!
translation.ja: イートニアンズが また得点

translation.en: -We got one back! -[crowd cheers]
translation.ja: うちが１点 獲得よ！

translation.en: -It's three-one! -Yes!
translation.ja: うちが１点 獲得よ！ よし

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[referee] Half-time!
translation.ja: ハーフタイム

translation.en: [referee] Half-time, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 皆さん　ハーフタイムですよ

translation.en: That Kinnaird is a bloody hard man to get around.
translation.ja: キネアードは手ごわい

translation.en: We need to fight fire with fire.
translation.ja: 奴らと同じ手を使おう

translation.en: They shove you, you shove 'em back. They hit you, you hit 'em back.
translation.ja: 奴らと同じ手を使おう 殴られたら殴り返せばいい

translation.en: -You can't win playing at their own game. -So, what do you suggest we do instead?
translation.ja: 通用しないさ なら どうすれば？

translation.en: [Etonian] At this rate, I'm gonna be coming out.
translation.ja: この調子じゃ楽勝だな

translation.en: I want five more goals this half, so we have something to celebrate at dinner.
translation.ja: あと５点 取って 晩餐(ばんさん)会で祝おう

translation.en: What makes you such an expert?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: I'm telling you how we play in Scotland, that's all.
translation.ja: スコットランドのスタイルだ

translation.en: Would you listen to him?
translation.ja: ファーガスに従え

translation.en: But Marshall's the captain.
translation.ja: 主将じゃない

translation.en: Well, Suter's the captain now.
translation.ja: 今は彼が主将だ

translation.en: Lads, football is not complicated.
translation.ja: サッカーは単純なゲームだ

translation.en: We don't always have to run the ball forward.
translation.ja: ドリブルに こだわるな

translation.en: I'll stay behind, and I'll play it back.
translation.ja: 俺が後方からパスする

translation.en: Jimmy, you know what you're doing, right?
translation.ja: ジミー　分かるよな？

translation.en: Tommy, this game is about space.
translation.ja: トミー　スペースが重要だ

translation.en: I want you to go out wide on the left.
translation.ja: 左翼でプレーしろ

translation.en: You're the fastest man on the pitch. You're not getting a chance to show it.
translation.ja: お前は足が速いのに もったいない

translation.en: [Fergus] Let the ball do the work.
translation.ja: ボールに仕事させるんだ

translation.en: We pass, we move, we pass again.
translation.ja: パスして走って またパス

translation.en: Space.
translation.ja: スペースを作れ

translation.en: But that's not how we play.
translation.ja: やり方が違う

translation.en: Wider. Right out onto the touchline. Spread out.
translation.ja: もっと離れろ みんな 広がれ

translation.en: -They've moved their formation. -Isn't that better?
translation.ja: 配置を変えた 何よりだ　中央が通りやすい

translation.en: We'll run right through them.
translation.ja: 何よりだ　中央が通りやすい

translation.en: -Come on, boys! I want the same again. -[whistle blows]
translation.ja: 前半戦と同じ調子でな

translation.en: -[Arthur] Same again! -Here we go, Darwen.
translation.ja: いくぞ

translation.en: It's five-four!
translation.ja: ５対４よ

translation.en: The ball's gone before you can put a tackle in.
translation.ja: タックルが決まらない

translation.en: Just do whatever it takes.
translation.ja: とにかく何とかしろ

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: 絶対に諦めるな

translation.en: [woman] It's five-five!
[referee] It's full-time, gentlemen.
translation.ja: フルタイム

translation.en: -[thunder rumbling] -[referee] Full-time, thank you.
translation.ja: フルタイムです

translation.en: We'll take a few minutes to get fresh air into our lungs and then extra time.
translation.ja: 数分 休憩してから 延長戦を始めよう

translation.en: Look, no extra time was agreed before the game.
translation.ja: 延長戦は聞いてない

translation.en: Since when was that a rule? It's not in Scotland.
translation.ja: 規則か何かか？ 俺の地元では問題ない

translation.en: It is here.
translation.ja: 残念だな

translation.en: Come on, boys.
translation.ja: 帰るぞ

translation.en: He said no to extra time.
translation.ja: 延長戦が却下された

translation.en: What's all this about? Why are we not playing extra time?
translation.ja: なぜ 延長戦をしない？

translation.en: [Fergus] Because he knows they're beaten.
translation.ja: 負けるから？

translation.en: It'll be replayed next Saturday.
translation.ja: 来週 再試合を

translation.en: These men have been up since before dawn and traveled for hours.
translation.ja: 数時間かけて ここに来た

translation.en: You expect them to do it all again?
translation.ja: また来週も来いと？

translation.en: We're here now. Let's finish it now.
translation.ja: 今日 決着をつけよう

translation.en: Look, we can refer this to the president of the Football Association, if you prefer.
translation.ja: サッカー協会の会長に 決めてもらうか？

translation.en: -Well, how long will that take? -Not too long.
translation.ja: 時間がかかる いいや

translation.en: Marindin?
translation.ja: マリンディン

translation.en: He's the president of the FA? He's your bloody goalkeeper.
translation.ja: ゴールキーパーの彼が 会長だと？

translation.en: We're all on the board of the Football Association. Do you have a problem with that?
translation.ja: 僕たちは みんな役員だ 何か問題が？

translation.en: Don't you?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: I'm afraid extra time wasn't agreed, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 事前に決めなかった

translation.en: Those are the rules. And rules are made to be adhered to.
translation.ja: だからナシだ　それが規則だ

translation.en: [Fergus] We had you beaten today. You know we did.
translation.ja: 今日の試合は 俺たちの勝ちだぞ

translation.en: If you are right, then you'll beat us again...
translation.ja: もし そうなら 君たちは来週―

translation.en: next Saturday.
translation.ja: 楽勝するはず

translation.en: No, I just worry one day Arthur will come home with a broken leg.
translation.ja: アーサーが 脚を折らないか心配だわ

translation.en: Well, if he does, you can be sure it won't be his own.
translation.ja: 脚を折るのは相手さ

translation.en: -[Alma laughs] -What am I missing up there?
translation.ja: 何の話だ？

translation.en: Oh, Monkey's telling me about the game.
translation.ja: モンキーが試合のことを

translation.en: Ah, Arthur's returning the favor at this end of the table.
translation.ja: アーサーと同じ話題だわ

translation.en: Have you told her how it ended?
translation.ja: 奥さんに話した？

translation.en: [sighs] There's nothing to tell.
translation.ja: 一体 何を？

translation.en: Well, now I'm intrigued.
translation.ja: すごく気になる

translation.en: [chuckles] Uh, it's not really my story.
translation.ja: 私が話すことじゃない

translation.en: How strange. Usually, I can't stop you talking about football.
translation.ja: 珍しいわね スポーツの話なら いつもは喜んでするのに

translation.en: Or cricket. Or rugby, for that matter.
translation.ja: スポーツの話なら いつもは喜んでするのに

translation.en: When it was a draw, Arthur wouldn't allow them extra time to settle it.
translation.ja: アーサーが 延長戦を拒んだから―

translation.en: So they must come back next week.
translation.ja: 来週 またやってくる

translation.en: All the way from Lancashire?
translation.ja: ランカシャーから？

translation.en: In all the years we've been married, I believe this is the first time you've ever asked me a single question about football.
translation.ja: 君はサッカーに 関心ないはずだ

translation.en: But is it true, Arthur?
translation.ja: 本当なの？

translation.en: We had to do what was right.
translation.ja: 規則は規則だ

translation.en: It seems rather unkind.
translation.ja: でも不親切よ

translation.en: -Can I second that? -[Marindin] We must follow the rules.
translation.ja: 私も同感 規則は守らないと意味を失う

translation.en: -Or why do we have them? -Absolutely.
translation.ja: 規則は守らないと意味を失う そのとおり

translation.en: And if you'd agreed extra time, Darwen would've beaten you.
translation.ja: 延長戦を認めたら 彼らに負けてた？

translation.en: [chuckles] Don't be absurd.
translation.ja: バカなことを

translation.en: Sorry, old boy, but I must agree.
translation.ja: きっと負けてた

translation.en: Another ten minutes and you would've been out of the Cup on your ear.
translation.ja: 10分ほどで カップから敗退に

translation.en: Are you suggesting I acted in an underhand manner?
translation.ja: 僕が不正な手段を 使ったとでも？

translation.en: Well, I think "underhand" is a bit strong. Shall we say, uh, the rules were very convenient.
translation.ja: “不正”は言いすぎだが 規則を都合よく使った

translation.en: Do you really think we would've been beaten by a gaggle of--
translation.ja: あんな連中に負けるわけない

translation.en: Of what? Mill workers?
translation.ja: 連中って労働者のこと？

translation.en: No. Professionals.
translation.ja: 違う　プロ選手だ

translation.en: Darwen team are fielding professional players.
translation.ja: つまり金をもらってる

translation.en: Paying two members of their team to play.
translation.ja: ああ　２人の選手がな

translation.en: But what's wrong with that?
translation.ja: 何がダメなの？

translation.en: This is a game for amateurs and gentlemen.
translation.ja: アマチュアのための ゲームだぞ

translation.en: It's our game.
translation.ja: 僕たちのゲーム

translation.en: [laughs] Your game?
translation.ja: あなたたちの？

translation.en: -We invented it. -[Alma] Who's "we"?
translation.ja: 発明者さ サッカーの発明者？

translation.en: The Old Etonians?
translation.ja: サッカーの発明者？

translation.en: [Arthur] Yes! As a matter of fact.
translation.ja: ああ　イートニアンズが

translation.en: Eton, Charterhouse, Harrow. Lots of schools played a part,
translation.ja: イートン校以外の 別の学校とも協力し―

translation.en: but the point is we took a raggle-taggle pastime...
translation.ja: イートン校以外の 別の学校とも協力し― 規則を一定化させた

translation.en: with different rules wherever it was played, and we turned it into a proper game.
translation.ja: 僕たちが 立派なゲームに仕上げたんだ

translation.en: For gentlemen.
translation.ja: 紳士のゲームにな

translation.en: Heavens. Do gentlemen shout?
translation.ja: 紳士は叫ばないものよ

translation.en: Ladies... I'm catching your eye.
translation.ja: 女性の皆さん 部屋を出ましょ

translation.en: Shall we leave the men to their port?
translation.ja: 紳士たちの邪魔なので

translation.en: Well, shall we talk about something a little less contentious?
translation.ja: もっと無難な話題に 変えるか？

translation.en: What? Like the Russian-Turkish War?
translation.ja: 露土戦争についてとか？

translation.en: I feel like a fraud. We're celebrating like we won.
translation.ja: みんな 勝ったかのように 祝ってるが

translation.en: We didn't win, did we?
translation.ja: 俺には無理だ

translation.en: We came nearer to winning than we ever have done before. And we may yet do it Saturday.
translation.ja: でも勝利には近づけたぞ 来週 勝てるかも

translation.en: Look around. You've given these people something to believe in.
translation.ja: お前は こいつらに夢を与えたんだ

translation.en: The game feeds the soul when they have nothing else that does it in their life.
translation.ja: こいつらの魂を満たすのは サッカーだけだぞ

translation.en: I'm gonna head back.
translation.ja: 俺は帰る

translation.en: -Come on, it's just getting started. -Jimmy, here.
translation.ja: 早すぎるぞ お前の分だ

translation.en: Don't drink too much.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎるな

translation.en: Fergie, come on, pal. Look, what's one more beer?
translation.ja: もう一杯くらい飲めよ

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: ファーガス

translation.en: Well, I suppose I am allowed an opinion.
translation.ja: 意見を持っちゃいけない？

translation.en: Not on things you don't understand.
translation.ja: 君は事情を知らない

translation.en: I think I understand perfectly.
translation.ja: 分かってるわよ

translation.en: You're afraid of them, aren't you?
translation.ja: 怖がってるとね

translation.en: Afraid?
translation.ja: 僕が？

translation.en: You're afraid new teams like Darwen will take over your game.
translation.ja: ゲームを乗っ取られるかもと

translation.en: You and Alfred and all the others. You're scared you'll lose control of it.
translation.ja: 他の人たちも同じよ ゲームを奪われるのが怖い

translation.en: That's ridiculous.
translation.ja: バカげてる

translation.en: Is it?
translation.ja: そう？

translation.en: Arthur, you're a decent man, but this game brings out the worst in you.
translation.ja: サッカーは あなたをイヤな人にする

translation.en: Makes you childish and defensive and petulant.
translation.ja: 普段は いい人なのに

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry if I disappoint you.
translation.ja: 落胆させて悪いね

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: I want us to be good parents...
translation.ja: いい両親になりたい

translation.en: and to set a good example for our child.
translation.ja: 子の手本となるような

translation.en: We will be.
translation.ja: なれるさ

translation.en: Of course we will be. Why wouldn't we be?
translation.ja: 心配することない

translation.en: I'm Fergus... Suter.
translation.ja: 俺はファーガスだ

translation.en: Oh, I know who you are.
translation.ja: 知ってるわ

translation.en: People won't stop shouting your name.
translation.ja: みんなの英雄だもの

translation.en: I'm Martha Almond.
translation.ja: 私はマーサ･アーモンド

translation.en: You should've sung in the pub tonight.
translation.ja: 店で歌うべきだ

translation.en: I should get going.
translation.ja: 帰るわ

translation.en: I could... I could walk you home, if you like.
translation.ja: よかったら 家まで送るよ

translation.en: See, it's like this.
translation.ja: よく聞いて

translation.en: I have a little girl. She's two years old.
translation.ja: 私には２歳の娘がいるの

translation.en: She has no dad.
translation.ja: 娘の父親は―

translation.en: He's gone, but...
translation.ja: 出てったわ

translation.en: I was never married to him in the first place.
translation.ja: 元々 未婚だったけどね

translation.en: Do you still want to walk me home?
translation.ja: それでも送りたい？

translation.en: Sure. Why not?
translation.ja: ああ　送りたい

translation.en: We got off on the wrong foot. Let me buy you another.
translation.ja: 出だしを間違ったが おごるぞ

translation.en: I shouldn't.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎた

translation.en: But go on, then. I'm buying, though. No arguments.
translation.ja: でも飲むぜ 俺に おごらせてくれ

translation.en: So what did Walsh offer to get you all the way down from Glasgow?
translation.ja: グラスゴーから来るのに いくら もらった？

translation.en: [man] Oh, my head!
translation.ja: 二日酔いだ

translation.en: Feels good to have a man in the house again.
translation.ja: 家に男性がいて うれしい

translation.en: I hope you don't mind me saying, but...
translation.ja: 君に言いたいことがある

translation.en: you've got a lovely smile.
translation.ja: 笑顔が すてきだ

translation.en: -Sorry, I don't mean to embarrass you. -No, you didn't.
translation.ja: 余計なことかな？ うれしいわ

translation.en: What's coming next, I wonder?
translation.ja: 次は何を？

translation.en: How about this?
translation.ja: これはどう？

translation.en: We best get going.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Aye, we should.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: -Thanks for that. -Ah, pleasure.
translation.ja: ありがとう いいのよ

translation.en: Oh, won't you have some breakfast?
translation.ja: あなた 朝食は？

translation.en: Oh, just a piece of bread.
translation.ja: パンを少しもらう

translation.en: Gentlemen,
translation.ja: 掛けてくれ

translation.en: the situation is no longer tenable.
translation.ja: 非常に危険な状態だ

translation.en: Our mills are struggling to turn a profit,
translation.ja: 工場の業績は最悪で―

translation.en: and the banks are starting to call in their loans.
translation.ja: 銀行も 借金の返済を求め始めてる

translation.en: It is regrettable that the only course of action
translation.ja: 残念ながら事業を守るには―

translation.en: I can see to protect our business is a wage cut.
translation.ja: 賃金を引き下げるしかない

translation.en: As chairman of the guild, I must insist that we present a united front on this matter.
translation.ja: 私は組合長として 共同戦線を張るよう求める

translation.en: To do otherwise would only invite trouble.
translation.ja: でないと トラブルが生じるだろう

translation.en: I propose a five-percent wage cut for every worker.
translation.ja: 労働者全員の賃金を ５％ 引き下げたい

translation.en: -All those in favor. -[all] Aye!
translation.ja: 賛成の者は？

translation.en: All those against?
translation.ja: 反対の者は？

translation.en: Nay.
translation.ja: 反対です

translation.en: Most of my workers have families. They can barely get by as it is.
translation.ja: 彼らのほとんどが妻帯者で 生活もギリギリだ

translation.en: James, you know I don't like it, but the alternative is that the mills go out of business.
translation.ja: 引き下げないと すべての工場が破綻して―

translation.en: [man] How will they get by then?
translation.ja: 労働者も無職に

translation.en: How many workers do you employ at your mill, Mr. Walsh?
translation.ja: ウォルシュさん 君の工場の労働者の数は？

translation.en: A couple of hundred?
translation.ja: 数百人か？

translation.en: A hundred and seventy-seven.
translation.ja: 177人です

translation.en: Across my mills, I have 3,000.
translation.ja: 私は複数の工場で 3,000人 雇ってる

translation.en: Cartwright?
translation.ja: カートライトは？

translation.en: Two thousand.
Two-and-a-half.
[chairman] The motion is passed.
translation.ja: 可決に至った

translation.en: Every member of the Cotton Masters' Guild will impose the same cut in wages.
translation.ja: 全組合員の工場で 賃金を５％ 引き下げること

translation.en: Do you ever worry...
translation.ja: 悩んだことは？

translation.en: about whether you'd make a good father?
translation.ja: “いい親になれるか？”と

translation.en: Not really.
translation.ja: ない

translation.en: I suppose I assumed...
translation.ja: 私は こう信じていたんだ

translation.en: that it would be just as it had been for my father. And for his father before him.
translation.ja: 自分も父や祖父のような親に なるはずだとな

translation.en: I don't remember seeing much of you when I was young.
translation.ja: 共に過ごした記憶が希薄です

translation.en: Don't be silly. You were brought down every evening.
translation.ja: バカ言うな 毎晩 部屋から連れ出したぞ

translation.en: No. I was brought down every tea time.
translation.ja: 僕が連れ出されたのは お茶の時間だ

translation.en: Or after tea, if Mama had guests, but I don't remember your being there often.
translation.ja: 母上の客が来る時です 夜ではない

translation.en: I was here.
translation.ja: 毎晩 会った

translation.en: You came and saw me sometimes when I was already in bed. But not much.
translation.ja: 僕が寝るのを たまに見る程度だった

translation.en: All over this country...
translation.ja: この世界には―

translation.en: all over the world, there are children with no food and no shelter.
translation.ja: まともな食事を取れない 貧しい子供が大勢いる

translation.en: You really cannot expect me to feel much sympathy for the childhood that you enjoyed.
translation.ja: 裕福な子供時代を送った お前に私が同情するとでも？

translation.en: So, there's nothing you would have done differently?
translation.ja: 悔いはないのですね？

translation.en: Don't over-complicate it.
translation.ja: 考えすぎだぞ

translation.en: Your role is to provide.
translation.ja: 父親の役割とは―

translation.en: To be the man of the house.
translation.ja: 大黒柱であることだ

translation.en: [Alma] Don't tell me you've quarreled again.
translation.ja: また もめたの？

translation.en: We were discussing fatherhood... as it happens.
translation.ja: 親になることについて 話し合った

translation.en: Oh, you surprise me. [chuckles]
translation.ja: それは驚きね

translation.en: You wouldn't be surprised if you heard what he said.
translation.ja: 父上らしい意見だったよ

translation.en: And you'll be happy to hear that I want to know my children better than he did.
translation.ja: 僕は子供との時間を 大切にしたい

translation.en: I am happy.
translation.ja: うれしいわ

translation.en: [Alma] I'm so looking forward to becoming a mother.
translation.ja: 母親になるのが楽しみよ

translation.en: -They've cut wages by five percent. -[woman 1] What?
translation.ja: 賃金が５％引き下げって

translation.en: -And what's next, ten? Fifteen? -[woman 1] How will I feed my family? -I know. -[woman 2] What?
translation.ja: この次は10％に なるかもしれないわ

translation.en: -It's a wage cut, five percent. -[woman] They can't do that.
translation.ja: 賃金が ５％も引き下げですって

translation.en: -The mill will reopen tomorrow. -[crowd clamors] Go and spend the day with your families.
translation.ja: 工場の再開は明日だ 今日は家族と過ごせ

translation.en: -What? Why? -[worker] You've already cut our wages.
translation.ja: なぜですか？ 閉鎖とか？

translation.en: [Walsh] It don't matter why. I'll get it sorted.
translation.ja: 心配するな　解決する

translation.en: What about pay? We gonna get paid for today?
translation.ja: 今日の分の賃金は？

translation.en: I can't pay you for days when the mill isn't working. -[clamoring] -[Walsh] I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 今日は工場が 稼働してないから払えない

translation.en: It'll all get straightened out by tomorrow. Please, go home.
translation.ja: 明日までには解決するから 帰ってくれ

translation.en: All members of Darwen Football Club, follow me.
translation.ja: チームのメンバーは来い

translation.en: The bank called in a loan.
translation.ja: 銀行に返済を求められ―

translation.en: When I couldn't pay up immediately, they foreclosed on the mill.
translation.ja: すぐに返せず 工場が差し押さえに

translation.en: Now, I can get the mill reopened tomorrow, but it'll take all the liquidity.
translation.ja: 明日 再開させるには 現金が要る

translation.en: What's this got to do with us?
translation.ja: どうしろと？

translation.en: The train tickets to take the team back down to London, I need that money.
translation.ja: ロンドンへの切符代を 返してほしいんだ

translation.en: I need it to get the mill reopened and get the men back to work.
translation.ja: でないと工場は取り戻せない

translation.en: We're gonna have to forfeit the match.
translation.ja: 不戦敗になる

translation.en: How much did you waste getting this pair in?
translation.ja: ２人にいくら払った？

translation.en: [man] What?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: [Tommy] He's paying 'em to play.
translation.ja: 引き抜くために 金をムダにしたのさ

translation.en: -He paid 'em to leave Partick. -Wait a minute.
translation.ja: 引き抜くために 金をムダにしたのさ 待て

translation.en: -I saw the money you gave Jimmy. -[Walsh] That's none of your business.
translation.ja: パブで金を渡した 黙ってろ

translation.en: Now we're out of the Cup 'cause you've given away our fares.
translation.ja: おかげで俺たちは敗退

translation.en: You can have it back.
translation.ja: 報酬なら返す

translation.en: -Barely a quarter of what's needed. -Maybe not.
translation.ja: 切符代の４分の１以下だ だとしても ２人が 報酬を得たのは確かだ

translation.en: But whilst our wages were being cut, you were paying them to play football.
translation.ja: だとしても ２人が 報酬を得たのは確かだ

translation.en: And what would've happened if we were found out? We'd be banned from the Cup for God knows how many years!
translation.ja: バレたら カップに 出場できなくなる

translation.en: -[Walsh] Enough. -You cheated.
translation.ja: よせ あんたは 俺たちを共犯者にしたんだ

translation.en: And you made the rest of us cheat without even knowing it.
translation.ja: あんたは 俺たちを共犯者にしたんだ

translation.en: I said that's enough!
translation.ja: もう黙れ！

translation.en: So it's over?
translation.ja: 終わりです？

translation.en: I'm very sorry.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: We don't know that Mr. Walsh won't find the money somewhere.
translation.ja: どうにかして金を集めるかも

translation.en: We've given him all day. As it is, we'll be sleeping on the train.
translation.ja: 早く出発しよう 今夜は列車で寝る

translation.en: But I--
translation.ja: でも…

translation.en: I thought the OEs would beat us,
translation.ja: 元々 覚悟はできてた

translation.en: and we would be sent home then, all right? With our tail between our legs.
translation.ja: イートニアンズに負けて 帰ることになるとな

translation.en: Don't pretend that you don't care about this place.
translation.ja: 冷たいふりするなよ

translation.en: I seen it last night when you realized how much this meant to these people.
translation.ja: お前もチームの仲間を 大事に思ってる

translation.en: You care about them too.
translation.ja: 俺と同じように

translation.en: No. I care about the money.
translation.ja: いいや　金のほうが大事だ

translation.en: But we can't give up now! It's the FA Cup!
translation.ja: ＦＡカップを諦めろと？

translation.en: It is finished, Jimmy.
translation.ja: もう終わりだ　ジミー

translation.en: The mill's closed. We're not going south.
translation.ja: 俺たちは試合に行けない

translation.en: And I can play football for nothing back home with my family.
translation.ja: 無報酬なら 故郷でやるのと同じだ

translation.en: Pack your things.
translation.ja: 荷造りしろ

translation.en: Stay.
translation.ja: 行かないで

translation.en: I can't.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: But you can.
translation.ja: お願い

translation.en: I can't.
translation.ja: 許してくれ

translation.en: Fergie and I...
translation.ja: ファーガスとは―

translation.en: We've always been together.
translation.ja: いつも一緒だった

translation.en: He needs me.
translation.ja: 俺が必要だ

translation.en: Stay till tomorrow at least. You don't want to travel at night.
translation.ja: 明日 出発すればいいわ 夜の旅は危険よ

translation.en: Are you coming or not?
translation.ja: 行かないのか

translation.en: Give me a minute. I swear to God.
translation.ja: 頼む　１分だけくれ

translation.en: You need rid of that hat before we get back. Folk'll have you down as a bloody Sassenach.
translation.ja: この帽子のまま家に戻ったら 笑われるな

translation.en: I don't care what they have me down as.
translation.ja: 笑われたって構わない

translation.en: Jimmy!
translation.ja: ジミー

translation.en: -[panting] You've got to come quickly. -What is it?
translation.ja: 一緒に来て どうした？

translation.en: You'll see. Come on. Come with me, both of you.
translation.ja: 来れば分かるわ ファーガスもよ

translation.en: This is our train.
translation.ja: 電車が来た

translation.en: We're going home.
translation.ja: 家に帰る

translation.en: [Fergus] I don't understand.
translation.ja: 説明を

translation.en: [Doris] Word got out Darwen would be forfeiting.
translation.ja: 町の人たちが 不戦敗はイヤだって

translation.en: The town won't have it. Tom Hindle came up with the idea.
translation.ja: 町の人たちが 不戦敗はイヤだって それでトムが解決策を考えた

translation.en: We're selling subscriptions.
translation.ja: 会費を集めてる

translation.en: They can either pay weekly or all at once.
translation.ja: 分割払いでも 一括払いでもいい

translation.en: The point is, we're going to the rematch.
translation.ja: これで試合に行けるぞ

translation.en: -Don't those people need that money? -Maybe, but they need football too.
translation.ja: 大切な生活費だろ 彼らにはサッカーも必要だ

translation.en: -[woman] We're proud of you, lads. -[man] You're what Darwen's made of.
translation.ja: この町の誇りよ

translation.en: [woman] Here you go.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: You're short three players. The match is due to start in ten minutes.
translation.ja: 試合10分前だが ３人 足りないぞ

translation.en: Well, I'm sure they won't be much longer.
translation.ja: もうすぐ来る

translation.en: You can use the dressing room if you'd like to be more comfortable.
translation.ja: 更衣室で待ってていいぞ

translation.en: We'll be on the pitch. If you don't have a team on time, you forfeit.
translation.ja: ここにいるよ 試合放棄にならないといいが

translation.en: [Walsh] Or you play with what you've got.
translation.ja: もしくは この人数でプレー

translation.en: You can't expect us to play when there's only eight of us.
translation.ja: ８人で出場しろと？

translation.en: To quote you, Mr. Kinnaird, "Rules are made to be adhered to."
translation.ja: キネアードさん あんたは規則を重要視した

translation.en: That is unless they happen not to suit you, of course.
translation.ja: 都合の悪い規則は無視か？

translation.en: Ten minutes... or we claim the win.
translation.ja: 10分後だ　でないと不戦勝だ

translation.en: To whom will you claim the win?
translation.ja: 誰に主張する？

translation.en: To the FA committee?
translation.ja: サッカー協会か？

translation.en: The press.
translation.ja: 新聞だ

translation.en: Then everyone will see what good sports you gentlemen are.
translation.ja: 紳士のスポーツだと 市民に伝える

translation.en: [scoffs] Who does he think he is?
translation.ja: 偉そうに

translation.en: If we don't have a full team, we ought to forfeit the game.
translation.ja: 放棄すべきかもな

translation.en: What? Why?
translation.ja: 放棄だと？　なぜだ？

translation.en: You heard him.
translation.ja: 聞いたろ？

translation.en: We're supposed to be gentlemen.
translation.ja: それが紳士だ

translation.en: Two more minutes and the match is ours.
translation.ja: あと２分で俺たちの勝利

translation.en: They're here. All of them.
translation.ja: 全員 そろったようだ

translation.en: Whatever he's paying you, make sure you earn it.
translation.ja: 報酬額は知らんが全力を出せ

translation.en: We had them beat before. We can do it again.
translation.ja: 今回は きっと勝てるはずだ

translation.en: Where the hell have you been? You almost cost us the match.
translation.ja: 一体 どこ行ってた？

translation.en: Now, come here.
translation.ja: よく聞け

translation.en: Now, we'll win this game, if we stop them playing their way.
translation.ja: 奴らのプレーを妨害すれば 勝てる

translation.en: Alfred, stay on Love. Don't give him any time on the ball.
translation.ja: アルフレッドは ラヴをマークしろ

translation.en: -What about Suter? He's the real problem. -[Arthur] I'll stay on Suter.
translation.ja: スーターはどうする？ あいつは僕がマークする

translation.en: You leave him to me.
translation.ja: あいつは僕がマークする

translation.en: -All right? -[Lyttelton] All right.
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: -[referee] Time. -[Lyttelton] All right, gents.
translation.ja: よし　行こう

translation.en: [referee] Gentlemen.
translation.ja: 始めます

translation.en: [Fergus] Jimmy!
translation.ja: ジミー！

translation.en: [Fergus] Cross it, Jimmy!
translation.ja: クロスしろ

translation.en: [Alma] Did you see what Alfred did? It didn't seem quite right.
translation.ja: 今 アルフレッドが ひどいことを

translation.en: Maybe not, but I'm afraid there'll be a great deal more of it.
translation.ja: どうやら このあとも続きそうね

translation.en: [Walsh] Foul! Referee!
translation.ja: 審判　ファウルだ！

translation.en: -Forward! -[Arthur] As a pack!
translation.ja: 前進しろ！

translation.en: -Get off me! -[grunts]
translation.ja: 離せ！

translation.en: I thought you youngsters were meant to be quicker than us older folk.
translation.ja: 若いのに足が遅いな

translation.en: Hurry up! At the ball! Heads up! Heads up!
translation.ja: さっさと立てよ しっかりしろ！

translation.en: [referee] Full-time. Full-time.
translation.ja: フルタイムです

translation.en: That was a good game.
translation.ja: いい試合だ

translation.en: Did you even play?
translation.ja: あんたのはプレーじゃないぞ

translation.en: Or did you just shadow me to stop me playing?
translation.ja: あんたのはプレーじゃないぞ ただの妨害だ

translation.en: There's no need to be a bad loser.
translation.ja: 負け惜しみか

translation.en: Kinnaird can have his Cup. Next season, it'll be ours.
translation.ja: 今回は奴らの勝ちだが 次は俺たちが勝つ

translation.en: Yeah? If you'll stay.
translation.ja: お前がいればな

translation.en: Do you want me to? Tommy Marshall thinks I'm a waste of money.
translation.ja: マーシャルは 俺を信頼してない

translation.en: Well, he's wrong.
translation.ja: あいつは間違ってる

translation.en: You're the only chance we've got of taking the Cup.
translation.ja: お前がいないと勝てない

translation.en: Besides, people here, they love to watch you play.
translation.ja: それに 俺たちは お前のプレーが好きだ

translation.en: It gives 'em hope and pride and so much more.
translation.ja: チームに 希望や誇りを与えてくれる

translation.en: You're valued here, Suter.
translation.ja: お前は英雄なんだ

translation.en: Come on, lads. Let's go home.
translation.ja: さあ　帰ろう

translation.en: Admit it, they won!
translation.ja: それで勝利さ

translation.en: Can I just say, well done us.
translation.ja: 我々に おめでとうだ！

translation.en: Speech! -Come on, Arthur, speech! -[man] Speech!
translation.ja: アーサー 勝利のスピーチを頼む

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: さあ

translation.en: I won't pretend I'm not jolly pleased the way things have turned out.
translation.ja: 今回の結果に 喜んでるのは否定できない

translation.en: [Arthur] To have beaten Darwen, and to be once again in the semi-finals...
translation.ja: ダーウェンを倒し 準決勝へと進むことができた

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I... I must leave you for a moment.
translation.ja: 悪いけど 少し失礼するわ

translation.en: -Shall I-- -[Alma] No, no, no. Please, sit.
translation.ja: 僕も… 大丈夫よ　座ってて

translation.en: Enjoy the rest of dinner.
translation.ja: 夕食の続きを

translation.en: And-- And well done.
translation.ja: おめでとう

translation.en: All of you. Very well done.
translation.ja: いい試合だったわ

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: 失礼

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: 掛けて

translation.en: Have they gone?
translation.ja: 帰った？

translation.en: They have, at last. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ああ　やっとな

translation.en: Ada had to put Monkey in a fireman's lock before she could get him out.
translation.ja: エイダは モンキーを担いで行ったよ

translation.en: How are you feeling? Hmm?
translation.ja: 気分はどうだ？

translation.en: You any better?
translation.ja: よくなったか？

translation.en: [sighs] No, not much better, to be honest.
translation.ja: あまり変わらないわ

translation.en: -[Arthur] Can anybody hear me?! -No!
translation.ja: 誰か 来てくれ！

translation.en: Somebody send for a doctor!
translation.ja: 医者を呼んでくれ！

translation.en: [Walsh] Now, we might've lost...
translation.ja: 敗退したが―

translation.en: but the town's still proud of you.
translation.ja: お前を誇りに思う

translation.en: Here's the man of the hour, Fergus Suter!
translation.ja: この町の英雄 ファーガス･スーター！
